EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Google Next_Q318.Post Event Email Google Next
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for stopping by the Pivotal booth at Google Next
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for stopping by the booth for a chat about adopting cloud-native application architectures to drive modern, software experiences for your users. For more information about the announcement of Pivotal’s partnership with Google on the knative project, check out the blog post <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/knative-powerful-building-blocks-for-a-portable-function-platform?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-google-next-q318]]>. If you’d like to discuss a hands-on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-google-next-q318]]>.
In the meantime, if you’re interested in learning more about how Pivotal Cloud Foundry (PCF) works with Google Cloud we have lots of online resources <[[https://cloud.google.com/pivotal/]]> to help. Also, feel free to download some of our free ebooks <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-google-next-q318]]> we have on cloud-native applications, microservices, and much more.
Check out some of our offerings for developers, and some cool blogs, videos and talks about PCF and PKS on Google Cloud:
- Pivotal Cloud Foundry with Google Cloud <[[https://pivotal.io/partners/google?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-google-next-q318]]> (Web Page) - Spring on Google Cloud Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/jul-12-spring-on-google-cloud-platform-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-google-next-q318]]> (Webinar Replay) - Preparing to deploy PKS on GCP <[[https://docs.pivotal.io/runtimes/pks/1-0/gcp-prepare-env.html?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-google-next-q318]]> (Tutorial) - Google Cloud Platform Service Broker for PCF <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/services-marketplace/data-management/google-cloud-platform?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-google-next-q318]]> (Web Page) - Saving 60 lives per second: Accepting donations at scale with PCF on GCP <[[https://content.pivotal.io/youtube-all-videos/saving-60-lives-per-second-accepting-donations-at-scale-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry-on-gcp-2?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-google-next-q318]]> (Video)
Stay in touch and join the conversation on our blogs <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-google-next-q318]]>, podcasts <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-google-next-q318]]>, and on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/PivotalDACH]]>.
We hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-google-next-q318]]>!
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
P.S. It's time to level-up. Join your peers at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-google-next-q318]]> and pick up new skills and start building better software, faster. Use the discount code Attendee_Event_100 to get $100 off the posted price.
